coverLetter:
Dear ,


I was excited to see your listing for the position of Bud Tender with Trimmer Work. Although I do not posses direct experience in the field I believe that my five years of inventory, customer service experience, and my passion for your products make me an ideal candidate for this role. You specify that you’re looking for a Bud Tender with high energy and enthusiasm, great listening & problem solving skills, and also able to follow directions well. I feel that I am more than capable of providing those skills and would like to be given an opportunity to prove that.


I am currently looking for a challenging position that will utilize the skills that I have acquired over the years working in Customer Service. I am a fast learner, and flexible, while always maintaining the good cheer that you’d want from the first person visitors see when they interact with the company.

I have attached my resume, and will contact you within the next week to see if we might arrange a time to speak.

Thank you so much for your time and consideration.

Best,

Christopher Crumsey
